quotes: Our anxiety does not come from thinking about the future, but from wanting to control it
author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes: Do not anticipate trouble or worry about what may never happen. Keep in the sunlight.
author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes: Somehow our devils are never quite what we expect when we meet them face to face
author: Nelson DeMille

quotes: It’s not stress that kills us, it is our reaction to it
author: Hans Selye

quotes: It's a good idea always to do something relaxing prior to making an important decision in your life
author: Paulo Coelho

quotes: The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one.
author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes: It is impossible to live without failing at something, unless you live so cautiously that you might as well not have lived at all - in which case, you fail by default.
author: J.K. Rowling

quotes: Stress is the trash of modern life; we all generate it, but if you don’t dispose of it properly, it will pile up and overtake your life
author: Danzae Pace

quotes: Today expect something good to happen to you no matter what occurred yesterday. Realize the past no longer holds you captive. It can only continue to hurt you if you hold on to it
author: Sarah Ban Breathnach

quotes: When one door closes another door opens; but we so often look so long and so regretfully upon the closed door, that we do not see the ones which open for us.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quotes: Nothing can bring you peace but yourself.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes: A good way to overcome stress is to help others out of theirs
author: Dada J. P. Vaswani

quotes: In times of stress, the best thing we can do for each other is to listen with our ears and our hearts and to be assured that our questions are just as important as our answers
author: Fred Rogers

quotes: Many a calm river begins as a turbulent waterfall, yet none hurtles and foams all the way to the sea
author: Mikhail Lermontov

quotes: Even too much sunshine can be devastating, while only with rain can growth occur. Accept both as part of the growing process in the garden of life
author: Donald S. Neviaser

quotes: Rule number one is, don’t sweat the small stuff. Rule number two is, it’s all small stuff
author: Robert Eliot

quotes: Every day brings a choice:to practice stress or to practice peace
author: Joan Borysenko
